title: Skyscape â€” Homage to R. H.
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; The Print Club, Philadelphia, PA, December 1964; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, December 1964 until May 1965 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased this lithograph for $90 (see copy of invoice in curatorial file.) 
[2]. On December 12, 1964 Mrs. Beal instructed the Print Club to send the lithograph addressed to her in care of Carnegie Institute. The lithograph was accessioned on May 11, 1965.
